review: My 1.3 year old baby started getting cavities. I took him to the doctor and Mam was very nice and polite. She explained the root cause and gave proper medication.

I had consulted dr revathi at Dentitia multispeciality dental clinic for my wisdom teeth removal, she explained me the cause, treatment plan and consequences of ignoring the procedure. She explained me the entire procedure and anaesthesia protocol, she listened to my needle fear but still she and her team removed the wisdom teeth without causing any discomfort.  I alwaaz recommend Dr revathi and her team for any dental procedures.
reply_text: At Dentitia, we have a team of pedodontist, orthodontist, implantologist, oral surgeon, prosthodontist, periodontist, laser specialists etc so we are superspecialized team with advanced and innovative technology, so we welcome all the patients for any dental needs

review: ** ******* ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ******.we went with our 2.5 year old baby girl to her.Due to early childhood caries her front teeth werent looking good . Initially we were scared and anxious as how would she handle such young kid but i must say her hospitality and way of treatment made us and our child comfortable and happy.she has done an amazing job.thank you so much ma'am for making my child's smile perfect.please do visit her for your dental problems.ðŸ˜€
reply_text: Thank you for these overwhelming response, our team in Dentitia, is very passionate about kids dental hygiene, we promote all caries preventive treatments, we believe in prevention is better than cureðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Revathi did veeners and smile makeover for me, she did a really good job. She explained the treatment in an elaborate and understandable manner. She completed the procedure at the earliest efficiently.

I consulted the clinic for replacement of crown.  Dr Revathi suggested wholesome treatment after verification of Xray.  Dr Revathi coordinated and arranged consultation  of other specialists like gum specialist and endocrinologist.   The clinic arranged for flexible to suit my availability and the doctors.   Overall a very pleasant experience and I am free from the pain with a new crown.
reply_text: The whole Westmead team is happy to treat u sir, u have always followed the instructions and never missed any appointments which is kind of rare, thankful to you sir ðŸ˜Š

review:
Doctor was very patient and clearly explained the issue with our daughter's tooth. Then explained the complete procedure  upfront and performed very effectively.
The assistant at westmead clinic also patient enough and handled our daughter with at most care.
The ambience and safety measures are very well followed.

Thank you
reply_text: We are very happy to hear from u sir,  she is an intelligent and smart kid, she cooperates with the treatment only if I explain the procedure, had a wonderful experience with her, Thanks ðŸ˜Š

review: I have been visiting Dr.Revathi M from last 1 year for my 6 year old kid. She is one of fantastic doctor I have known so far in Bangalore. She is very friendly and nicely encourage the kid for treatment, otherwise it is next to impossible to convince kids for any kind of treatment. So far my kid has gone through tounge-tie removal, removal of damaged tooth. All went very good.. Thank you Doctor
reply_text: Thanku for your kind words sir, am soo happy with his tongue movements and speech after the procedure, you have followed all the postoperative instructions so credit goes to u as well.

review: ********** ** * ******** ************* Dentist with extensive experience and practical knowledge. She has great way and knack with our daughter, AadyaSreshta. Dr.Revathi informs, convinces why so and so treatment is needed, how much would it cost and sets right the expectations, takes consent of parents and proceeds with any treatment. Very Approachable and Amicable.
reply_text: Thanku soo much for your kind wordsðŸ˜Š Aadya herself is very cooperative kid, I have been treating her since 5 years, she is always charming and disciplined while undergoing treatment.

review:
Dr Ravathi is very professional friendly and helpful she explained me about my treatment plan and options no pressure 
The staff is well trained and clinic is very clean and neat
No waiting in the clinic for appointment because one patient one time 
Dr Revathi took great care of me and made my treatment very easy I highly recommend her ** **** **** ******* ********* *** ******** **** ****** ***
reply_text: Thankful for your kind words sirðŸ˜Š in the starting it was tough for me to gain your confidence but once u trusted me everything went v smooth, we actually enjoyed the process, we had v good time with u sirðŸ˜Š

review: The doctor explained me in detail with Xray image showing the infection in teeth.  The doctor suggested a holistic treatment with cleaning, RCT and fixing the crown.  The doctor coordinated with gum specialist  and endodontist for the treatment by showing flexibility in appointment schedule.  The specialist explained the importance of oral hygiene for maintenance of teeth.  Overall a satisfying experience. ðŸ‘Œ
reply_text: Thanku soo much for your kind words sir, I must say we are v happy to serve you, u were always cooperative during the treatment and never missed any appointment which is very rare to find these daysðŸ˜Š
